review.reviewBody: first time having this! soooo deelish! had the Big Kahuna Breakfast Sandwich and it was amazing! and the Iced Mocha was super tasty! definitely my new fav coffee place!
I usually order some sort of coffee and açai bowl. The coffee is always hot and açai bowl fresh! Love this place!
Always so good! My favs are the lanai smoothie, wave Açai bowl and the Honolua breakfast sandwich.
Big Kahuna Breakfast Bagel GF, excellent, as always.
Good bagel sandwich, however, the green tea drink looks like it has ice/cold drink in the picture and it was delivered hot instead
